channel.title: Life in Germany on The Electronic Press
channel.description: Recent content in Life in Germany on The Electronic Press

item.title: Getting new lenses for Lensfun
item.description: Since moving to Germany, I’ve started taking pictures. Lots here is beautiful, and my cell phone camera just didn’t seem to be cutting it. So I bought a camera – a (used) Canon G5 X. The photos at the top and bottom of this post are a couple I’m proud of. Of course, using a real camera means using real photo editing software. I run Linux on my laptop. Specifically, at the moment, Ubuntu.
